body:
> Why do not backport the upstream [commit](https://github.com/qt/qtbase/commit/ab01885e48873fb2ad71841a3f1627fe4d9cd835):

Ok, now using that.

> FWIW, tested it with #21778.

Sorry, was building only for macOS, did not test linux builds.

> Sorry, was building only for macOS, did not test linux builds.

Ok. Reverted back to my original change.

> > FWIW, tested it with #21778.
> 
> Sorry, was building only for macOS, did not test linux builds.

A fixed [patch](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commit/2e3868e5f77e235f9e19c25df63dd9f52a4ea5c5) has been suggested in https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr21778/0331-test.

> A fixed [patch](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commit/2e3868e5f77e235f9e19c25df63dd9f52a4ea5c5) has been suggested in https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr21778/0331-test.

Ok. I've re-reverted.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24668](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24668) (build, qt: bump Qt5 version to 5.15.3 by prusnak)
* [#24391](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24391) (build: stop overriding user autoconf flags by fanquake)
* [#21778](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21778) (build: LLVM 14 & LLD based macOS toolchain by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Can we use one patch per line next time, please?
diff_hunk:
@@ -13,7 +13,7 @@ $(package)_patches += dont_use_avx_android_x86_64.patch dont_hardcode_x86_64.pat
 $(package)_patches += fix_android_jni_static.patch dont_hardcode_pwd.patch
 $(package)_patches += qtbase-moc-ignore-gcc-macro.patch fix_limits_header.patch
 $(package)_patches += fix_bigsur_style.patch use_android_ndk23.patch
-$(package)_patches += rcc_hardcode_timestamp.patch
+$(package)_patches += rcc_hardcode_timestamp.patch duplicate_lcqpafonts.patch
